Ideal Kids Outdoor Toys: Catch ball set improve children’s eye-hand coordination ability and motor skills. Promote interaction among players. Enjoy the fun with our toss catch ball game set wherever you are. Best choice for the kids, family and friends

Wicked Big Sports combines traditional sports and games with oversized fun! Each game features classic play with extra-large elements. The Wicked Big Sports products are portable and versatile play at the beach, in your backyard, at your tailgating party or at the park! Whether or not you are wicked skilled, or wicked competitive, you better be ready to have a wicked good time! Wicked Big Sports Volleyball is an oversized version of a classic Volleyball. Updated version to allow more durability. This Soccer Ball can be used to play a traditional Volleyball game with a Wicked Big twist or create your own game. The bigger the ball the bigger the fun so let the games begin!
Wicked Big Sports Volleyball takes traditional Volleball to a whole new level
Classic Volleyball BUT WICKED BIG
This set includes: 1 Wicked Big Ball, 1 pump, 1 needle
Soft fabric covers the Wicked Big Sports Volleyball and the UPDATED inner level allows the ball to inflate and protects from damages
Great for the beach, park, yard and tailgating! Ages 8 years+

Product Description

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Cool Game Sets for Outdoor Activities： While enjoying the fresh air, playing the ball catch game in backyard, park or on the lawn will be a very pleasant experience. Top Gift Idea: It will be a perfect idea to give away the toss and catch ball game set as a gift for Easter and birthday.More Interaction: To play the sport games at least 2 persons are required. So it will be a good chance for socialization and interaction among friends.Family Pack: 4 Pop-launcher Baskets and 6 balls, your whole family members can join the family games. You will enjoy the toss and catch ball game and love sports more than ever.

Mission and Vision of Duckura

Duckura are committed to the production and sales of toys for many years, and have been adhering to the provision of better quality, more creative, educational toys, and better service. Make kids learning in playing. Encourage parent and kids play outdoor and become friends.

Great sports and super fun!

Do you love sports and anything that involves throwing and grabbing a ball? Are your kids crazy about ball catching games?

If the answer to those questions is yes, then you should try these sport toys. We have designed the ball catching game that will offer you endless hours of ball throwing and catching.

PACKING LIST

Pop-launcher Baskets x 4 (2 Blue & 2 Green) Balls x 6 (3 Green + 3 Red) Colorful Storage Box x 1

High Premium and Safe Material

The launcher baskets and balls are made from high-quality ABS plastic. You will never worry about your kids getting hurt.

Educational Sports for Kids

This catch ball set will help your kids develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, problem-solving, spatial and communication skills!

Activities for Indoor & Outdoor

Our catch ball games can be played both indoor and outdoor.Very easy to take apart and assemble, convenient for taking to vacations, picnics, tailgating, camping, birthday parties and more!

Carnival Toss Games

Great Toy Set for Kids

【TOSS N’ CATCH GAMES】Are you boring during the holidays with family? This toss and catch ball sets are suit for you. Whatever backyard, lawn, camping, beach, pool or indoor, you can play with them anywhere you want.
【EASY To PLAY】Hold the ball holder basket in your hands, press the trigger to launch the ball and another one use basket to catch it. Let’s start the throwing and catching ball races with friends.
【ADULTS & KIDS ACTIVE】These sports games are good ideal for both kids and adults, whatever different skill levels. Suitable to indoor or outdoor activities with family.
【DEVELOP FINE MOTOR SKILLS】Besides being fun, this sport toys can help your kids collaborate and interact with other kids more easily. Help them develop fine motor skills and increase social skills.
【PACKAGE INCLUDE】Package will Comes with 4 launchers(2-blue and 2-green), 6 ping-pong balls(2 color random) and Exquisite Color box.(Great for Gifts).

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:56:21 UTC – Details)


Product Specification

Metal:Alloy
Material:Acrylic and Rattan
Color:Gold

Package Contains:

16 Pairs Rattan Earrings and Tassel Earrings
1 Packing BOX

Wonderful Gift

Give This Earring As A Unique Present to Your Loved Ones, Like Lover, Girlfriend, Wife, Fiancee, Mother, Mother in Law, Daughter, Friend or Yourself for Valentine’s day, Mother’s day, Christmas Day And So On. Express Your Love to Them and Make Them Feel Special and Happy.

COMPLETELY VERSATILE

This earring fit all your dress, like jeans, dress, coat ect. You Can Wear It for Birthday Party, Wedding, Anniversary, Festival Celebration, Concert. Just Get It and Show Your Own Style In the Crowd.

Maintenance Tips:

Avoid Chemicals. Please take it away from cleaning agents,perfumes, body moisturizer, ect. It can take off the finish and change color
Avoid Contact with Water, No Baths, Pools, Sea Water, etc. If it gets wet that can leave dark water spots which are difficult to remove
Please Don’t Wear It When Sleeping. To keep your gorgeous jewelry looking like new, take it off at the end of the day and give it a quick wipe down with a microfiber cloth
Avoid Violent Collision. It is easy to deform your jewelry
Take it off when you sweating a lot, avoid prolonged wear. It can cause erosion
Please store them in zippered plastic bags, squeeze air out to limit the oxygen that gets to jewelry

Please note:

Since this earring back is small, please keep it away from children and pets, beware swallowed
Please clean it with soft cloth before your wear it every time, if you feel uncomfortable, just stop to wear it.

We Promise 90-Days Exchange and Money Back Guarantee.If You Have Any Problems on Our Earring,Contact us We Will Reply You within 24 Hours

HANDMADE PREMIUM MEXICAN BLANKET: Our serape and baja blankets are cozy, practical, and full of vibrant colors to add joy wherever you take them. Offered in pack of 1, each Aztec blanket is unique, woven by local artisans in Tlaxcala, Mexico on a traditional wooden loom.
THE PERFECT YOGA BLANKET: Take this high-quality Mexican blanket to your yoga practice. Super soft, breathable, and easy to carry – choose your colors and mix for your workouts!
VERSATILE & STYLISH: Perfect for every adventure, these Mexican blankets are your go-to blanket for yoga, picnics, long summer nights, or to cuddle in while relaxing at home!
SOFT & DURABLE: Twin bed size (45×70 inches), lightweight (3 pounds), and soft – these serape blankets are made to last! They get softer and more comfortable with every wash, while you enjoy their proven quality!
GIFTS THAT GIVE BACK: An original and authentic handmade artisan gift for every occasion! A gift that makes a difference. For each blanket you buy, we donate to our charity partner “Water mission”. Join us in the fight against poverty and for equal access to water!
